Susannah Bassett Book of Common Prayer
Bassett, Susannah
1974.108
0.3 Linear Feet in one manuscript box
circa 1800 A copy of the Anglican Book of Common Prayer with the name Susannah Bassett inscribed on the title page, circa 1800. On the inside back cover of the volume are the names and birth dates of enslaved African Americans, dated from 1799 to 1808. A0023
Conditions Governing Access
